title: Bitcornsholder4
author: Bitcornsholder4
content: To those that have been to the Bitcoin Conference. What has been your experience? What the biggest benefit you have received?What were the pros and cons?Did you network with anyone that led to employment, business deals, friends ?Will be going to Bitcoin Conference 23 and I am excited. I look forward to your stories.

comments.author: theskillzdatklls
comments.body: The ones in general that I've been to I haven't liked. Too salesy and fake for me. Waste of time. By the third or fourth one I was just having a bad time and said never again. But that's just me personally.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Not sure if I'd call it a "conference" per se, but a sort of small event at a mall. It was bad — they focused too much on the price/gains rather than the other important aspects.Quote from: Bitcornsholder4 on August 31, 2022, 04:21:49 AMWill be going to Bitcoin Conference 23 and I am excited. I look forward to your stories. Fortunately for you, The Bitcoin Conference is probably the best bitcoin conference there is.P.S. Don't forget your hoodie+facemask! Protect your privacy at all times.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcornsholder4 on August 31, 2022, 04:21:49 AMTo those that have been to the Bitcoin Conference. What has been your experience?Quite expository in cryptocurrency in general, you got to understand some real thoughts about bitcoin and you learn from their like never before, it also place you an eye opener on other applicable areas of interest and benefit with bitcoin in the running of economy, you also experience talk show, seminars, exhibitions with different sections dealing with every aspect of bitcoin in general.Quote from: Bitcornsholder4 on August 31, 2022, 04:21:49 AMWhat the biggest benefit you have received?Bitcoin knowledge.Quote from: Bitcornsholder4 on August 31, 2022, 04:21:49 AMWhat were the pros and cons?I thought i know it all not until i got exposed more with my attendance in bitcoin conference.Quote from: Bitcornsholder4 on August 31, 2022, 04:21:49 AMDid you network with anyone that led to employment, business deals, friends ?Yes, I've met with quite some experts and do follow up with them on thier social media accountQuote from: Bitcornsholder4 on August 31, 2022, 04:21:49 AMWill be going to Bitcoin Conference 23 and I am excited. I look forward to your stories. Have a good experience ahead.

comments.author: rby
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on August 31, 2022, 05:09:42 AMNot sure if I'd call it a "conference" per se, but a sort of small event at a mall. It was bad — they focused too much on the price/gains rather than the other important aspects.Sure, the one that OP will attend on 23rd would be bad too. The one I attended was bad also. If you want to attend again, it will also be bad. This is because you have good knowledge about Bitcoin. All those half-baked information about Bitcoin will offend you because you hold the real information. I bet you, they will not talk about Bitcoin in that conference, it is a group of guys that invented an altcoin, they are looking for people to dump it on.
